string.name: AddHint
string.u: Click here to add a dish to your list

resources.string:
•To use this app, click on "DECIDE!" button, and the app will pick a random dish from your list.

•After the app picks a dish, you can find the nearby restaurants by clicking on the "Find restaurant" button.

•You can add new dishes to your list by writing the dish name to the "Click here to add a dish to your list" and pressing "Add".

•You can find your list by clicking on the list icon at the top right corner.

•You can remove unwanted dishes from your list by clicking on the list item.
